name: Reverse (TheNavis)
description:
In this mysterious 20-minute story based side scroller, a girl survives the apocalypse and learns she can time travel. 

Yours Truly has lived a quiet life with her family on their farm her whole life . Now, with everyone turned mindless zombies and her only escape being the time-bending clocks inhibiting a greenhouse on the property, she must come to decide how to live in her ever-expanding and mysterious post-apocalyptic world, which seems to still have some secrets yet...

With an ambient soundtrack, straightforward gameplay, and a winding narrative, Reverse is developer Navis's first game.
